transcript_parts.text: in the darkest of shadows lies all
things foul an assembly of cowards who
throw in the towel a cave where they
huddle
hide in a bubble hoping trouble won't
find them but we all know how that goes
a slow transformation from who they were
made for disillusioned unstabled a great
calling wasted
grass has grown over the road they must
go weeds grown have now choked all the
hope they once known
sacrificing destiny on jealousy's altar
trade bravery for safety in the name of
their hardship
fear is their mother and they don't know
their father because he was a quitter
now they're quitters also their fate
they chose it when they stopped trying
hell is froze over with them trapped
inside it damned by the fear that they
decided to confide in yes hard this life
is but these ones ran
crying self-inflicted prisoner blame the
devil the minister the president
parishioner really
you're just insecure there is only one
responsible for your soul
that's you so it's on you if you let it
go they say that once you're saved
you'll always be saved but what happens
when quitters run away
because they're afraid quitters now
curse don't believe their own words
excuses rehearse can't convince
themselves first but in the depths of
this darkness this home of heart's heart
and lies something so small
so easily disregarded a faint light
that's shining we thought had gone
out something like a diamond in the
rough that surrounds a seed that still
grew without water or sun
fruit that went rotten all but the one a
guest that arrives no one wanted to come
you can hide all you want but there's
nowhere to run
because in the land of the lost and the
haze of the fog a memory emerges that
they thought they forgot for a second
they remember the reason that they
fought and the reason that they stopped
doesn't matter as much
now like fire it's spreading trend
setting redemptive
coming out of the wilderness with a new
message stepping from hell bringing
heaven to the helpless who would have
thought the loss it rejected would get
it
now the planet's been flipped right side
up cowards and quitters rise out of
their slump
trust in their heart carries enough to
overcome when the mind changes the world
changes as a result
sacred and scared they're the same
letters a small change in the way you
put it all together
the tiniest of shifts and now something
is clicked no longer scared of the risk
but inspired by it
